departments.name: Appraisal Subcommittee
departments.notes: FOIA Rules are in Subpart D.

description: The Appraisal Subcommittee's (ASC) Mission Statement:  To provide federal oversight of State appraiser regulatory programs and a monitoring framework for the Appraisal Foundation and the Federal Financial Institutions Regulatory Agencies in their roles to protect federal financial and public policy interests in real estate appraisals utilized in federally related transactions.
name: Appraisal Subcommittee
